title: TNSED Manarkeni
description:
Your journey of simple and enjoyable self-learning begins here!

Explore Math, Physics, Chemistry, Botany, and Zoology lessons aligned with the Tamil Nadu State Board syllabus through this engaging app. The content is delivered in the form of bi-lingual animated videos (Tamil & English) designed to make learning easy and enjoyable.

Understand concepts effortlessly and assess your knowledge with a quiz at the end of every video. 

This app has been developed by the Tamil Nadu School Education Department as part of its digital learning initiative.

The app is now live with a rich collection of lessons, and new content is being added regularly. Stay tuned for updates as more subjects, videos, and quiz questions are continuously rolled out.

summary: A self-learning and assessment app designed for students and teachers
developerLegalName: TAMILNADU STATE MISSION OF EDUCATION FOR ALL SAMAGRA SHIKSHA
developerLegalAddress: State Project Directorate Samagra Shiksha Dpi Campus College Road, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600006, India
